title: CJ Entus Frost
body:
WHERE IS CJ ENTUS FROST (AZUBU FROST) NOW?? WHAT ARE THEY DOING?? MADE IT TO SEASON 2 FINALS (AND LOST, FU TAIPEI ASSASSINS) AND HAVEN'T SEEN ANY OF THEM SINCE. There's literally no info on them beyond the sponsor chance (feb 4th, 2013). ARE THEY COMIN' BACK?? IF SO, WHEN?? 
SHY IS GOD.

replies.body: are you both srs?.......they still play for cj entus......did neither of you actually google it before you posted?

http://lol.gamepedia.com/CJ_Entus_Frost

Says they disbanded.

http://lol.gamepedia.com/CJ_Entus_Blaze

Says they disbanded too.

Did you actually google it before you posted lmao. :p

now you're trolling....but knowing the internet, you probably arent so ill indulge you. see i purposely just said "cj entus", because if you google "cj entus" the very same "cj entus" that i mentioned to its entirety, you will see that a few of the players of both those previous teams now play in a combined team. get it now?

You said they play for CJ Entus when CJ Entus is disbanded...

If you're going to answer a question why don't you state where the players of CJ Entus are now - and don't laugh at people for not knowing that they've moved to other teams and at least be accurate because it says CJ Entus has disbanded and maybe if you posted where the players are now you'd be answering a question, not just laughing at people and making errors.
